pr_title: Adding support to autoconfigure Cloud SQL ipTypes

timeline.message: Adding support to autoconfigure Cloud SQL ipTypes

timeline.bodyText:
Have you considered putting this logic into DefaultCloudSqlJdbcInfoProvider instead?
That class is specifically designed for creating the JDBC URL string.
timeline.author: meltsufin

replies.bodyText:
No. I remember that I looked at patching the jdbcUrlTemplate in DatabaseType, but I didn't have the GcpCloudSqlProperties there. I must have overlooked DefaultCloudSqlJdbcInfoProvider.
Code moved.
